body_html: Indeed, modifying the graph triggers TF_ExtendGraph, but this overhead is something like 1ms, and insignificant for interactive use (ie, modify the graph, test it, modify some more, etc), meanwhile leaking 1GB of GPU memory is significant
body_text: Indeed, modifying the graph triggers TF_ExtendGraph, but this overhead is something like 1ms, and insignificant for interactive use (ie, modify the graph, test it, modify some more, etc), meanwhile leaking 1GB of GPU memory is significant
body: Indeed, modifying the graph triggers TF_ExtendGraph, but this overhead is something like 1ms, and insignificant for interactive use (ie, modify the graph, test it, modify some more, etc), meanwhile leaking 1GB of GPU memory is significant
